entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 90 near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
